attributes.action: Say why a few lib dem politicians should be able to stop petitions which have often been signed by more people then the majority who voted for them.
attributes.additional_details: A few lib dem politicians kick up a fuss liked a spoilt child and the entire government has to stopped because of them. Similary, If tens of thousands have voted on a petition. A few MPs should not be able to stop the majority because of their position. LIb dems go on about how they believe in democracy but are not being democratic by stopping the will of the majority. If over a hundred thousand people vote on a petition it sould get a fair hearing not blocked by Clegg.
